Simran Dhingra

Hey there! I’m Simran, a PhD student in Chemistry at Louisiana State University. If you want to know more about me, feel free to take a look at

  • my education,
  • my research projects,
  • the papers I’ve published,
  • my participation in conferences and workshops, including my talks,
  • the fellowships and awards I’ve received
  • my role as a teaching assistant,
  • my academic achievements and extra-cirrucular activities.

You can also find most of this info in my CV, which I’ve linked here.

I am mostly interested in

  • Organic Chemistry; specifically, Small Molecule Inhibitors
  • Targeted Cancer Therapeutics
  • Bioconjugate Chemistry
  • Analytical Chemistry, Materials Science

News

  • 23/06/2022: “When heating in winter becomes a luxury” (University of Oldenburg)
  • 24/05/2022: “Wie knappes Heizmaterial gerecht verteilen? Forschende veröffentlichen Studie zu Verteilungsgerechtigkeit” (University of Oldenburg)
  • 20/04/2022: “Lernen, mit der Freiheit umzugehen” (University of Oldenburg)
